meaningMnemonic: Just imagine a beast with a <radical>lid</radical> for a head and <radical>fins</radical> for feet, running around looking as insane as possible (really imagine it!). When it runs up to you, it shows you the top of its lid-head. On it is written the numbers 666. Why? Because it's a spawn of the devil, and the number <kanji>six</kanji> is the devil's number.
readingMnemonic:
Whenever we need to remember the reading ろく we just use the word <reading>rock</reading>. 

So, think about the devil and the devil's number. What is often associated with those things? Why, <reading>rock</reading> (ろく) and roll is. Imagine the lid-head fin-legged beast suddenly blasting out rock music in the middle of his destructive mayhem.
